content: Hi! I'm wondering if there's any option to go directly to the code of a definition instead of the doc comment?
I kinda want it to go to the ident by default, don't really think there's much of a reason to go to the top of the comment block
To clarify, goto definition already works that way
I think it's only workspace symbols that is not yet fixed
Oh I see, the project I'm on is indeed a workspace
